CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Register Courses stage positioned above or below the Pass the final test stage?
SRP.A: The Register Courses stage is positioned {above} the Pass the final test stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Register Learning Platform?
VE.A: The value of stage Register Learning Platform is {100%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Complete the first lesson?
VE.A: The value of stage Complete the first lesson is {31%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Register Courses?
VE.A: The value of stage Register Courses is {56%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Register Learning Platform, with a value of {100%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Pass the final test, with a value of {16%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Register Courses to stage Complete the first lesson?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Register Courses to stage Complete the first lesson is {25%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 24%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Register Learning Platform} stage has {100%}, the {Register Courses} stage has {56%}, the {Complete the first lesson} stage has {31%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 17%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Pass the final test} stage has {16%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 24% and 43%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Complete the first lesson} stage has {31%}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Complete the assignment to Pass the final test, or from stage Register Courses to Complete the first lesson?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Register Courses} to {Complete the first lesson} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Register Courses to Complete the first lesson, or from stage Complete the first lesson to Complete the assignment?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Register Courses} to {Complete the first lesson} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Register Courses to Complete the first lesson, from stage Register Learning Platform to Register Courses, or from stage Complete the assignment to Pass the final test?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Register Learning Platform} to stage {Register Courses} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Register Learning Platform} and {Register Courses} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Complete the assignment} and {Pass the final test} stages.
